Definition: Binary layout specification for data structures
Usage: Used in guardian-macros to define frame layouts
Represents a single data field in a binary frame
Enum for Integer, Str, Bytes, Rest field kinds
Enum for Big/Little endian byte ordering
Put or Delete operations for batch processing
Main data model for user information
Contains street, city, country, postal data
Contains segment statistics and schema info
Various error types for different failure modes

Original: Lưu nhiều bản ghi cùng lúc
Hằng số kích thước segment tối đa
Hằng số magic kiểm tra file segment
